param.name: cert_id
param.doc: Name of the certificate request to export.

param.name: export
param.doc: An indication that this operation is to retrieve the entire file not just a snippet. This parameter is required

method.name: GET
method.doc: To export a certificate database and stash file with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command and include the export request parameter on the SSL Certificates resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.

param.name: Content-Type: plain/text
param.doc: HTTP response code and the zip file that contains the certificate database and stash file.

response.doc: File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.

param.name: Content-Type: plain/text
param.doc: HTTP response code and the zip file that contains the certificate database and stash file.

response.doc: An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

param.name: Content-Type: plain/text
param.doc: HTTP response code and the zip file that contains the certificate database and stash file.

response.doc:
200 OK
The zip file that contains the certificate database and stash file.

param.name: Content-Type: plain/text
param.doc: HTTP response code and the zip file that contains the certificate database and stash file.
